Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Alpha-defensin-related sequence 10 (CRS4C-4; Cryptdin-related protein 4C-4; Rodents, mammals, ani
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Apparent precursor of a secreted, cationic, proline- and cysteine-rich peptide that contains Cys-Pro-Xaa repeats. Unlike cryptdin, the proposed mature peptide region lacks the structural motif characteristic of defensins. It may have microbicidal activities (By similarity).
Sequence Information.Tissue specificity: Paneth cells of the small bowel.

Literature.Title: A family of defensin-like genes codes for diverse cysteine-rich peptides in mouse Paneth cells.
Literature.Author: Huttner KM, Ouellette AJ.

Literature.Title: The status, quality, and expansion of the NIH full-length cDNA project the Mammalian Gene Collection (MGC).
Literature.Author: Feingold EA, et al, Malek J.

Literature.Title: The status, quality, and expansion of the NIH full-length cDNA project: the Mammalian Gene Collection (MGC).
